    • Compound Poisson-Normal Regression

Basis for Estimated Marginal Means for cpn Model

emm_basis.cpn.Rd

This function provides the required components for computing estimated marginal means from a fitted Compound Poisson-Normal (CPN) model using the emmeans package. It extracts the model matrix, fixed-effect estimates, and covariance matrix, and provides information about degrees of freedom and transformation on the response scale.

Usage

emm_basis.cpn(object, trms, xlev, grid, ...)

Arguments

object

A fitted model object of class cpn.

trms

Terms object, usually derived from delete.response(terms(object)).

xlev

A list of levels for factors, typically from the data used in fitting.

grid

A reference grid (data frame) over which to ompute estimated means.

...

Additional arguments (currently ignored).

Value

A list with components used by emmeans:

X

Model matrix for the reference grid.

bhat

Estimated regression coefficients.

V

Covariance matrix for the fixed effects.

nbasis

Matrix for any non-estimable basis (empty here).

dffun

Function to return degrees of freedom.

dfargs

Arguments to dffun.

misc

Miscellaneous information including link function details.
